name: Robot Reclamation Project - Tuatara Island
description:
Will update this later. Just submitting the game first... 

The Robot Reclamation Project was an idea my wife and I came up with for the 60 hour Game Jam : Games Factory Jam 8 in October 2018. 

Instructions are included in a README file with the download. The game was made in Unity. My wife provided all the factual information about the Tuatara and I build the game. 

Was a lot of fun! Hope you enjoy it. Please feel free to ask anything and I will get back to you ASAP. 

Update 1 : Fixed building prices so you cant accidentally not be able to build the ore building right at the start if you build two of any other building. 

Update 2: Fixed the ability to click buildings after the end screen pops up.
